> **注意**: このページはまだ日本語に翻訳されていません。以下は英語の原文です。

```ts
function getUint(value, name?): bigint
```

Returns `value` as a bigint, validating it is valid as a bigint value and that it is positive.

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `value` | [`BigNumberish`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/BigNumberish) | The value to convert. |
| `name`? | `string` | The name of the value. |

## Returns

`bigint`

The value.

## Throws

If the value is negative.

[utils/maths.ts:170](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/utils/maths.ts#L170)
